Product_ID-P001.Product_Name: Nature Cookies, NonGMO Chewy Chocolate Chunk
Product_ID-P001.Description: Non-GMO Project Verified and Kosher. Enjoy chocolate chunk cookies that taste as if they just left the oven. Indulge in a chewy texture that will melt in your mouth. Simply crafted with ingredients including wheat flour and semisweet chocolate chunks.Thoughtfully made without high-fructose corn syrup or hydrogenated oils.
